name: Runouwinter Is Coming
additional_info:
Made for http://runouw.com/forums

NOTE: This style looks better with the animated header disabled. (User Control Panel>Board Preferences>Edit Display Options>Hide Flash Header>Yes)


[Screenshots had to be cropped heavily to reduce filesize.]


2016.08.27 - initial release
2016.09.03 - changed ranked username colours & navbar/footer text colours
2016.09.04 - forum width now determined by percentage instead of pixels
2016.09.10 - added rule for [rp][/rp] text


Credit to Bogdan/Arturia for some code taken from his theme Runowinter
https://userstyles.org/styles/122075/runowinter
